item.title: DWS launches JV for first German-regulated euro stablecoin
item.author: EBR European Business Report
item.description:
By Iain Withers and Elizabeth Howcroft
LONDON, July 11 (Reuters) - European fund giant DWS has created a new company as part of its plans to launch the first German-regulated cryptocurrency next year, the firm's CEO told Reuters, as major financial companies jostle to launch new digital tokens.
De...
